album-details


{{album.id}}

{{album.title}}

photos
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import {ActivatedRoute} from "@angular/router"; import {AlbumService} from "../album.service"; import {album} from "../products"; @Component({ selector: 'app-album-details', templateUrl: './album-details.component.html', styleUrls: ['./album-details.component.css'] }) export class AlbumDetailsComponent { album :album newTitle : string = "" constructor(private route :ActivatedRoute , private albumService:AlbumService) { this.album = {} as album; } ngOnInit():void{ this.route.paramMap.subscribe((params)=>{ const id = Number(params.get('id')) this.albumService.getAlbum(id).subscribe((album)=>{ this.album = album; }) }) } changeAlbum(){ this.albumService.putAlbum(this.album,this.newTitle).subscribe((album)=>{ this.album.title = album.title; this.newTitle = "" }) } }
